item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Lady Gaga - GAGA Chromatica Ball - STEREO Lossless
item.description:
Was this broadcast in stereo? I'm looking for a lossless 2 channel (stereo) audio rip. 5.1 down mixing doesn't always sound right.

I've seen a few posts here of audio rips but I haven't been able to confirm if the source is stereo or 5.1. Also, there is a slight gap between the tracks so when played together, audio does not flow seamlessly.


https://sharemania.us/threads/lady-gaga-gaga-chromatica-ball.245238/
https://sharemania.us/threads/lady-gaga-gaga-chromatica-ball-from-hbo-16bit-48khz.245374/
https://sharemania.us/threads/lady-gaga-gaga-chromatica-ball-from-hbo-320kb-s-48khz-16bit.245253/
item.author: ahankins
